sentences.en: ‘I’ll see you tomorrow,’ said John, zipping his jacket.
sentences.cn: “明天见。”约翰边说边拉上外套的拉链。

sentences.en: Better zip your jacket; it's cold outside.
sentences.cn: 最好还是把你上衣的拉链拉上, 外面很冷.

sentences.en: Experienced snowboarders can zip downhill amazingly fast.
sentences.cn: 有经验的滑雪板运动员能够以极快的速度滑下山。

sentences.en: He pulled the zip of his leather jacket down slightly.
sentences.cn: 他稍稍往下拉了拉皮夹克的拉链。

sentences.en: If your zip sticks, it might be because a thread has caught.
sentences.cn: 如果你的拉链拉不动, 那有可能是因为有根线卡住了.

sentences.en: Many people inadvertently transpose digits of the ZIP code.
sentences.cn: 很多人疏忽之下会颠倒邮政编码中数字的顺序。

sentences.en: The helicopter can zip along at about 150 kilometres an hour.
sentences.cn: 该直升机能以每小时150公里左右的速度疾进。

sentences.en: The zip fastener had long since been wrenched out of them.
The zip on my skirt had broken.
The zip sticked because it was caught by a thread.
sentences.cn: 拉链被线卡住了,拉不动.

sentences.en: These zip-top bags are great space-savers if storage is limited.
sentences.cn: 如果可储藏的地方有限，这些拉环式背包能节省很大空间。

sentences.en: Tommy Tune gives the choreography his usual class and zip.
sentences.cn: 汤米·图恩在编排的舞蹈中注入其一贯的优雅和活力。

sentences.en: When you download the font it may be in a compressed format, such as a zip file.
sentences.cn: 下载的字体可能为压缩格式，如压缩文件包。

sentences.en: Zip disks could be used to store the equivalent of three music CDs.
sentences.cn: 压缩盘可以用来储存相当于3张音乐光碟容量的内容。

sentences.en: Zip drives help people to organise their important information.
sentences.cn: 压缩磁盘驱动器有助于人们管理重要信息。

sentences.en: Zip up, or you'll catch a cold.
sentences.cn: 把拉链拉上, 否则你会感冒.

phrases.tran_cn: 拉上拉链；增添滋味；增加兴趣或生命力

trans.tran_en: two lines of small metal or plastic pieces that slide together to fasten a piece of clothing
to fasten something using a zip
to fasten something using a zip
